reviewText: This is a good movie with a lot of gore and brutal death scenes that mostly is with a baseball bat. The clown mask is the same one as the kid michael myers mask in the halloween 2007 movie. I wasn't sure what to expected really when i ordered and thought it was gunna be another bad-made movie but i was wrong and its worth buying to add to my collection.

Half of the profits go to the Salvation Army. The story line is great, about a man who has a brain tumor and loses his memory. His story is outstanding and all ages will love how nicely it ends.

Don Leske Sr.
